snippet: WALDMAN--Dr. Alan. The Weseley family, Elaine, Paul, Maxine, Lisa and Linda, suffer a common grief in the sudden and untimely death of our friend, Dr. Alan Waldman. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Ulla, daughters Erica and Ingrid, their husbands and children. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WALDMAN--Dr. Alan. The Weseley family, Elaine, Paul, Maxine, Lisa and Linda, suffer a common grief in the sudden and untimely death of our friend, Dr. Alan Waldman. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Ulla, daughters Erica and Ingrid, their husbands and children. 1/3
